head.supplied: Bright April 7th/73 ¶ Baron Von Mueller ¶ Curator Botanical Garden ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I am directed to renew the application made too late last year for a number of Ornamental Tees &c for the Bright Public Ce...

div.p: I73/9282, unit 750, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I am directed to renew the application made too late last year for a number of Ornamental Tees &c for the Bright Public Cemetery. If you will please estimate when they will be ready for removel, we will endeavor to get some person to forward them up.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Hon. Secr. to the Bright Cemetery Trustees
MS annotation: 'Answ | 15/4/73'. Letter not found, but see J. Nuttall to M, 21 April 1873.
